eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A FIRE WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Chelan, WA; AT 05:34 PM ON SEP 21, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 07:34 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Chelan County Sheriff WILDFIRE WARNING, Level 2 Evacuation Advisory in Entiat Valley. The affected area is Entiat River RD from Dinkelman Canyon RD to Mills Canyon. Roads and evacuation routes can become blocked. If you do not leave now, you could be trapped, injured, or killed. For updates check Local Radio, TV or the Chelan County Emergency Management Website and Facebook.
Repeat.
Chelan County Sheriff WILDFIRE WARNING, Level 2 Evacuation Advisory in Entiat Valley. The affected area is Entiat River RD from Dinkelman Canyon RD to Mills Canyon. Roads and evacuation routes can become blocked. If you do not leave now, you could be trapped, injured, or killed. For updates check Local Radio, TV or the Chelan County Emergency Management Website and Facebook. Please monitor local radio stations and Chelan County Emergency Management Facebook for updates.
